name: Vapor Specter Regiment
description: An army composed of vapor-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for one conflict.

name: Force Specter Regiment
description: An army composed of force-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for three conflicts.

name: Cosmic Specter Regiment
description: An army composed of cosmic-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for four conflicts.

name: Phase Specter Regiment
description: An army composed of phase-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for two conflicts.

name: Squad Shield Restore (Small)
description: Restores Shields to all squad members. Pulses 35 Shield every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Health Restore (Small)
description: Restores Health to all squad members. Pulses 30 Health every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Health Restore (Small)
description: Restores Health to all squad members. Pulses 30 Health every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Energy Restore (Small)
description: Restores Energy to all squad members. Pulses 25 Energy every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Ammo Restore (Small)
description: Restores Ammo to all squad members. Ammo per pulse: 30 Rifle, 15 Pistol, 12 Shotgun, 5 Sniper every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Shield Restore (Large)
description: Restores Shields to all squad members. Pulses 300 Shield every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Health Restore (Large)
description: Restores Health to all squad members. Pulses 300 Health every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Energy Restore (Large)
description: Restores Energy to all squad members. Pulses 100 Energy every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Ammo Restore (Large)
description: Restores Ammo to all squad members. Ammo per pulse: 110 Rifle, 60 Pistol, 50 Shotgun, 30 Sniper every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Sniper Ammo Box
description: Restores a bunch of sniper ammo.

name: Shotgun Ammo Box
description: Restores a bunch of shotgun ammo.

name: Shield Restore (Small)
description: Instantly restores 50 Shield.

name: Rifle Ammo Box
description: Restores a bunch of rifle ammo.

name: Pistol Ammo Box
description: Restores a bunch of pistol ammo.

name: Omni Ammo Box
description: Fully restores all ammo types.

name: Health Restore (Small)
description: Instantly restores 50 Health.

name: Health Restore (Large)
description: Instantly restores your Health to full.

name: Archwing Launcher
description: Summons an Archwing for use during free roam missions.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Archwing Launcher Segment not being Chat linkable.

name: Sentry Gun
description: Ordis delivers an automatic turret that will fire upon nearby visible enemies.

name: Snow Globe
description: Frost deep freezes any vapor and moisture in the area, creating a protective sphere with brief invulnerability to boost its strength.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed script error when casting Frost’s Snow Globe inside another invulnerable Snow Globe to stack them.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.18.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Frost’s Snow Globe disappearing if a large amount of damage is taken during its invulnerable phase.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Hotfix 21.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed shooting Frost’s Snow Globe from the outside with the Lenz resulting in the Blast damage applying twice instead of Cold then Blast.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Opticor not being able to damage enemies outside of a Frost’s Snow Globe when fired from inside the Snow Globe.

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Frost’s Snow Globe ability radius stating the incorrect value in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed cases where NPCs would teleport sporadically when pushed by Frost's Snow Globe.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Atlas’ Tectonics being unable to go through Frost’s Snow Globe as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/541593-tectonics-boulder-can-not-go-through-snow-globe/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Corpus Nullifiers will no longer destroy Frost’s Snow Globes if Frost enters the Nullifier Shield and globes are placed elsewhere.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Frost’s Snow Globe not properly being affected by power range Mods.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Frost’s Snow Globe not using the proper timer for Clients.

name: Med-Tower
description: Ordis delivers a Med-Tower to restore health to nearby allies.

name: Laserturret
description: Launches homing missiles

name: Vortex
description: Creates a whirling mass of energy that violently attracts nearby enemies, crushing their atoms into a tiny spec of matter

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Vauban’s Vortex sometimes spontaneously killing enemies.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed other player Telos Boltace Stormpaths overriding your own vortex/blast timing.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Hotfix 19.12.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Vauban’s Bastille and Vortex lingering in tiles after players have left said tile.This resulted in enemies continually being damaged or immobile even after the ability ended.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #2
patchlogs.changes: Excluded Reactant and Index Point pickups from Simulor, Inaros' Sandstorm, Zephyr Tornado, and Vauban's Vortex. This also fixes the exception lists for the Simulor; it wasn't supposed to be moving  gameplay objects (eg Datamass, Excavation Power Cells, Raptor Cells, etc) but it generally wasn't of a problem because the objects were heavy enough (properly excluding them should run faster too!). As more and more gameplay components rely on pickups, we've addressed this issue as it is commonly discussed by you all.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.10.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Ember's Fireblast, Vauban's Vortex and Volt's Electric Shield Abilities being cancelled when you enter a Nullifier Bubble.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Synoid Simulor not properly creating a vortex when used with Hall of Mirrors as a Client as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/524634-simulorsynoid-simulor-and-mirage-clones/

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Vauban’s Vortex not properly gathering nearby items.

name: Carpet Bomb
description: Ordis drops bombs in a line from your position to the beacon you placed.

name: Override
description: Ordis hacks into enemy systems and disrupts security protocols for a short period.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.2.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Nekros Prime arm dangle details appearing when equipped on the Nekros Irkalla Skin. As is standard and precedent for all in-house Deluxe Skins, the override of Prime Details is the intent.

name: Squad Ammo Restore (Medium)
description: Restores Ammo to all squad members. Ammo per pulse: 80 Rifle, 45 Pistol, 35 Shotgun, 20 Sniper every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Air Support Charges
description: Charges consumed by Landing Craft Air Support.

name: Squad Shield Restore (Medium)
description: Restores Shields to all squad members. Pulses 100 Shield every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Squad Health Restore (Medium)
description: Restores Health to all squad members. Pulses 100 Health every 5s for 20s.

name: Squad Energy Restore (Medium)
description: Restores Energy to all squad members. Pulses 50 Energy every 5s for 20s.

name: Squad Ammo Restore (Medium)
description: Restores Ammo to all squad members. Ammo per pulse: 80 Rifle, 45 Pistol, 35 Shotgun, 20 Sniper every 7.5s for 30s.

name: Cipher
description: Single-use device used for auto-hacking the lockdown control panels.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.11.0 + 17.11.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue preventing the Steam Controller to interact with the Cipher button for hacking puzzles or the Battle/Extract menu on Defense Missions.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.16.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Ciphers on Grineer Hack Puzzles not showing up when players have HUD disabled.

name: Hobbled Dragon Key
description: Speed is greatly reduced while key is equipped.

name: Decaying Dragon Key
description: Shields are greatly reduced while key is equipped.

name: Bleeding Dragon Key
description: Health is greatly reduced while key is equipped.

name: Extinguished Dragon Key
description: Damage is greatly reduced while key is equipped.

name: Twilight Apothic
description: Creates an organic compound composed of rare plant species. Effects unknown.

name: Nightfall Apothic
description: Creates an organic compound composed of rare plant species. Effects unknown.

name: Sunrise Apothic
description: Creates an organic compound composed of rare plant species. Effects unknown.

name: Eros Arrow Skin
description: Show the enemy how much you care with the adorable Eros Arrow skin. Works with all bows.

name: Stable Corruptor
description: Injected into a Fomorian Reactor this corruptor will imbalance the fuels. Critically imbalanced reactors will eventually implode, destroy the ship. Slow but effective, recommended for Solo Tenno.

name: Phase Specter
description:
A replicant cloned from a Warframe which can be deployed to assist Tenno on their missions.
Once crafted this Specter may be donated to a clan and used by a Tactician to craft a Phase Specter Regiment to assist in Solar Rail defense.

name: Shield Osprey Specter
description: Deploys a SHIELD OSPREY EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

name: Codex Scanner
description: Samples a target of interest for later analysis in your Codex (25 charges).

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Ember’s Vermillion Helmet flame FX lingering when using a sniper scope, Nosam Cutter, Codex Scanner or Synthesis Scanner.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to use the Codex Scanner to scan Ayatan Statues and other pickups.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Mars Junction only rewarding 1 Codex Scanner instead of 25.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Codex Scanner not working on ragdolled enemies.

name: Roller Specter
description: Deploys a ROLLER EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

name: Razorback Cipher
description: Used to bypass security systems that protect the Razorback's holding cell.

name: Cosmic Specter
description:
A replicant cloned from a Warframe which can be deployed to assist Tenno on their missions.
Once crafted this Specter may be donated to a clan and used by a Tactician to craft a Cosmic Specter Regiment to assist in Solar Rail defense.

name: Moa Specter
description: Deploys a MOA EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

name: Scorpion Specter
description: Deploys a SCORPION EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

name: [Ph] Mining Marker
description: [PH] Place a persistent marker with a mining icon at your position

name: [Ph] Fishing Marker
description: [PH] Place a persistent marker with a fishing icon at your position

name: [Ph] Combat Marker
description: [PH] Place a persistent marker with a combat icon at your position

name: Synthesis Scanner
description: Synthesize a genetic data of the target and uploads it to the Sanctuary.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Ember’s Vermillion Helmet flame FX lingering when using a sniper scope, Nosam Cutter, Codex Scanner or Synthesis Scanner.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.6
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Synthesis Scanner not scanning Simaris targets.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being in an unarmed state when attempting to switch to a Synthesis Scanner while sheathing a weapon.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Synthesis Scanner counting as ‘next shot’ or ‘next hit’ for the purpose of some Warframe Abilities/Passives (Volt’s Static Passive, Mesa’s Ballistic Battery, etc).

patchlogs.name: Update 16.1: Volt Prime
patchlogs.changes: Fixed players without a Synthesis Scanner equipped receiving mid-Mission notification of a rare capture target.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the UI becoming permanently tinted the wrong color if using a hotkey to switch off the Synthesis Scanner.

name: Antiserum Injector
description: Injects antiserum into Vaporizers or the user to prevent armor degradation.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Operators being able to use Antiserum Injectors even though UI shows they have none.

name: Potent Pherliac Pods
description: Creates 50x Potent Pherliac Pods that releases powerful pheromones to attract the Infested.

name: Pherliac Pods
description: Creates 50x Pherliac Pods that releases powerful pheromones to attract the Infested.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.17.0 + 22.17.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to cast Warframe abilities on Pherliac Pods.

name: Kinetic Siphon Trap
description: Specialized trap for attracting and slowing the movement of synthesis targets.

name: Force Specter
description:
A replicant cloned from a Warframe which can be deployed to assist Tenno on their missions.
Once crafted this Specter may be donated to a clan and used by a Tactician to craft a Force Specter Regiment to assist in Solar Rail defense.

name: Fomorian Disruptor
description: When activated, it disrupts a Fomorian core's Omega energy field, making it vulnerable. Also shields Tenno from Omega radiation.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.20.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed crashing when attempting to play the Fomorian mission and a squad member is missing the required Fomorian Disruptor in their Gear.

name: Starburst
description: Celebrate the holiday with fireworks! Light up the sky with this single use consumable item.

name: Grand Finale
description: Want a more spectacular fireworks display to show your patriotism? Celebrate in style with this single use consumable item.

name: Humble Void Offering
description: Give unto The Void 1000 credits.

name: Faithful Void Offering
description: Give unto The Void 10,000 credits.

name: Passionate Void Offering
description: Give unto The Void a generous 100,000 credits.

name: Corrupted Lancer Specter
description: Deploys a CORRUPTED LANCER EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

name: Corrupted Bombard Specter
description: Deploys a CORRUPTED BOMBARD unit to fight for you.

name: Clem Clone
description: Deploys a clone of Clem to fight for you.

name: Charger Specter
description: Deploys a CHARGER EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

name: Vapor Specter
description:
A replicant cloned from a Warframe which can be deployed to assist Tenno on their missions.
Once crafted this Specter may be donated to a clan and used by a Tactician to craft a Vapor Specter Regiment to assist in Solar Rail defense.

name: Beta Corruptor
description: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Alpha counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Alpha Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.

name: Ki'Teer Fireworks
description: A bombastic symphony of color.

name: Grustrag Three Beacon
description: Lures the Grustrag Three out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where assassin would normally appear.

name: Zanuka Hunter Beacon
description: Lures the Zanuka Hunter out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where assassin would normally appear.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a crash that could occur when being attacked by Zanuka after using a Zanuka Hunter Beacon.

name: Stalker Beacon
description: Lures the Stalker out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where assassin would normally appear.

name: Ancient Healer Specter
description: Deploys an ANCIENT HEALER EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

name: Alpha Corruptor
description: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Beta counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Beta Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.

name: Vermillion Antitoxin
description: This is an extremely effective antitoxin.

name: Lapis Antitoxin
description: This is an extremely effective antitoxin.

name: Topaz Antitoxin
description: This is a moderately effective antitoxin.

name: Amethyst Antitoxin
description: This is a mildly effective antitoxin.

name: Citrine Antitoxin
description: This is a moderately effective antitoxin.

name: Beryl Antitoxin
description: This is a mildly effective antitoxin.

name: Fosfor Rahd
description: Launch a bright red flare that significantly increases Affinity Range while active.

name: Fosfor Blau
description: Launch a bright blue flare that significantly increases Affinity Range while active.

name: Adrenal Stim
description: Elevates adrenaline levels to enable faster movement while increasing sensitivity to damage.

name: Clotra Stim
description: Revives a target that is bleeding out, and provides a bonus revive to any allies in range.

name: Refract Stim
description: Coats the target in a film that refracts light, allowing undetected movement.

name: Calcifin Stim
description: Hardens skin, fortifying against damage while restricting movement.

name: Pharoma
description: A compound that relaxes nearby fish.

name: Luminos Dye
description: Dyes the waters with a compound that sticks to fish passing through it, making them easier to see from the shore.

name: Eidolon Phylaxis
description: Sentient immunity to the Infestation is exploited with this refined phylaxis. Formulated specifically to combat Infested boils.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.18.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Host migrating while fighting the Hemocyte causing bonus Affinity to be lost for using Infested Catalysts and Eidolon Phylaxis.

name: Infested Catalyst
description: This refined toxin catalyst has been formulated to reinforce the Thrax Toxin and maximize damage to the Infested boil.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.18.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Host migrating while fighting the Hemocyte causing bonus Affinity to be lost for using Infested Catalysts and Eidolon Phylaxis.

name: Cuthol Bait
description: This bait is comprised of materials that are known to attract Cuthols, a fish found only in pond hotspots during the night.

name: Norg Bait
description: This bait is comprised of materials that are known to attract Norg, a fish found only in lake hotspots during the night.

name: Glappid Bait
description: This bait is comprised of exotic materials that are known to attract the elusive Glappid, a fish found only in ocean hotspots during the night.

name: Peppered Bait
description: This bait attracts fish that are active during the day.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed unintentional fish being attracted to Peppered Bait.

name: Twilight Bait
description: This bait attracts predatory fish that are active in either day or night.

name: Murkray Bait
description: This bait is comprised of materials that are known to attract Murkrays, a fish found only in ocean hotspots during both day and night.
